name: 3sstr3g
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(c2, c3))
-| wb(wss(c2, c3), wss(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(c2, c3))
-| wb(wss(c2, c3), wss(c0, c1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wss(c2, c3), wss(c0, c1))
-| wceq(c2, c0)
-| wceq(c3, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(c2, c3))
-| wceq(c2, c0)
-| wceq(c3, c1)

comment: Substitution of equality into both sides of a subclass relationship. (Contributed by NM, 1-Oct-2000.)
